xyzcopy.option.title: XYZCopy Options
xyzcopy.option.replaceDebugKey.tooltip: Makes the F3 + C debug key combination use the Location Template.
xyzcopy.option.replaceDebugKey.tooltip2: The Mod Keybind will still work as normal.
xyzcopy.option.useKeybindWithF3.tooltip: The Keybind will only work when F3 is also held down. (e.g. X → F3 + X)
xyzcopy.option.useKeybindWithF3.tooltip2: [!] Beware that this overrides any vanilla debug key combinations using the same key.
xyzcopy.option.locationTemplate.tooltip: The template used when copying the player's location.
xyzcopy.option.decimalPlaces.tooltip: Number of decimal places to use for the location.
xyzcopy.option.copyMessageClipboard.tool: The message shown when the location is copied to the clipboard.
You can use Chat Colors with & codes (e.g. &a for green, &c for red)
xyzcopy.option.sendInChatInsteadOfCopyin: Send in Chat Instead of Copying to Clipboard
Send the location in chat instead of copying to the clipboard.
xyzcopy.option.copyMessage.tooltip: The message shown when the location is shown in chat only.
xyzcopy.option.copyMessage.tooltip2: → Look at Send in Chat Instead of Copying to Clipboard.
xyzcopy.option.copyMessage.tooltip3: You can use Chat Colors with & codes (e.g. &a for green, &c for red)
xyzcopy.option.block.locationTemplate.to: The template used when copying the block location.
xyzcopy.option.block.includeFluids.toolt: If fluids should be included when copying the block location.
xyzcopy.option.block.copyMessageClipboar: The message shown when the block location is copied to the clipboard.
You can use Chat Colors with & codes (e.g. &a for green, &c for red)
xyzcopy.option.block.sendInChatInsteadOf: Send Block Location in Chat Instead of Copying to Clipboard
Send the block location in chat instead of copying to the clipboard.
xyzcopy.option.block.copyMessage.tooltip: The message shown when the block location is shown in chat only.
→ Look at Send Block Location in Chat Instead of Copying to Clipboard.
You can use Chat Colors with & codes (e.g. &a for green, &c for red)
